maintenance.soil: Likes moisture, best planted in sphagnum moss
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, also resistant to half shade, put in places with scattered light when growing in enclosed environments
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, do not spray water on leaves
maintenance.fertilization: May nourish itself by capturing insects, for better appearance, apply liquid fertilizers at 1/4-1/5 recommended concentration on leaves monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten leaves timely
